data.lyric:
[ti:Show Yourself (From "Frozen 2"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Idina Menzel/Evan Rachel Wood]
[al:Frozen 2 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Show Yourself - Idina Menzel/Evan Rachel Wood
[00:02.85]Lyrics by：Kristen Anderson-Lopez/Robert Lopez
[00:05.70]Composed by：Kristen Anderson-Lopez/Robert Lopez
[00:08.55]ELSA：
[00:11.40]Every inch of me is trembling
[00:14.61]But not from the cold
[00:19.81]Something is familiar
[00:22.39]Like a dream I can reach but not quite hold
[00:27.25]I can sense you there
[00:30.44]Like a friend I've always known
[00:35.27]I'm arriving
[00:38.58]And it feels like I am home
[00:43.28]I have always been a fortress
[00:47.19]Cold secrets deep inside
[00:51.60]You have secrets too
[00:55.51]But you don't have to hide
[00:59.74]Show yourself
[01:02.19]I'm dying to meet you
[01:05.77]Show yourself
[01:08.62]It's your turn
[01:11.75]Are you the one I've been looking for
[01:14.82]All of my life
[01:19.76]Show yourself
[01:22.76]I'm ready to learn
[01:26.19]Ah ah ah ah
[01:29.71]SIREN：
[01:30.02]Ah ah ah ah ah
[01:32.43]ELSA：
[01:33.23]I've never felt so certain
[01:35.81]All my life I've been torn
[01:40.82]But I'm here for a reason
[01:43.76]Could it be the reason I was born
[01:48.25]I have always been so different
[01:52.06]Normal rules did not apply
[01:56.30]Is this the day
[01:58.16]Are you the way
[02:00.07]I finally find out why
[02:04.03]Show yourself
[02:06.20]I'm no longer trembling
[02:09.83]Here I am
[02:11.98]I've come so far
[02:15.51]You are the answer I've waited for
[02:18.78]All of my life
[02:22.50]Oh show yourself
[02:25.69]Let me see who you are
[02:30.89]Come to me now
[02:34.97]Open your door
[02:38.66]Don't make me wait
[02:42.39]One moment more
[02:45.62]Oh come to me now
[02:50.16]Open your door
[02:53.99]Don't make me wait
[02:57.78]One moment more
[03:08.31]Where the north wind meets the sea
[03:13.62]IDUNA：
[03:13.99]Ah ah ah ah
[03:16.09]There's a river
[03:17.64]Ah ah ah ah
[03:19.59]Full of memory
[03:23.39]Come my darling homeward bound
[03:28.50]ELSA：
[03:28.84]I am found
[03:33.16]ELSA/IDUNA：
[03:33.75]Show yourself
[03:36.24]Step into the power
[03:39.41]Grow yourself
[03:41.95]Into something new
[03:44.99]IDUNA：
[03:45.28]You are the one you've been waiting for
[03:47.98]ELSA：
[03:48.28]All of my life
[03:49.99]All of your life
[03:51.57]ELSA：
[03:52.06]Oh show yourself
[03:57.35]Ah ah ah
[04:01.17]Ah ah ah ah
[04:06.08]Ah ah ah ah
